items.title: Project Management Professional (PMP/CAPM) Exam Preparation

visible_instructors.title: Optima Train
visible_instructors.name: Optima
visible_instructors.job_title: Practical Training for Today's Knowledge Worker

items.headline: Project Managers earn six figure salaries and are in hot demand. Join this elite group and elevate your career.
objectives_summary: The PMBOK® Guide only summarizes or lists Project Management framework and context topics in Chapters 1 and 2.  The entire book is basically a reference book for the PMI project management standard.  It is not oriented toward learning the material.  For this reason, the class covers each framework, context, standard, and knowledge area topic in detail with information from the source reference materials used to create the exam.  General knowledge that the project manager is expected to know through experience and prior training is covered, so that the course is comprehensive in preparing you to take the test.
Note: PMI is the owner of the registered trademark for Project Management Professional (PMP/CAPM) (PMP,CAPM)®
